japanese: そうじゃな、/そうも考えられるのう……。
english: That's right, /you could think of it that way …

japanese: そうかぁ、/夏がやりたくないなら仕方ないな。
english: I see, if Natsu doesn't wanna,/can't be helped.

japanese: そうだ、!0さんは/どんな話だと思います？
english: Right,　!0, /what story do you think it is?

japanese: そうだよ。/九郎は、生徒会に入りたいのか？
english: Right./Does Kuro wanna join student council?

japanese: そうか？/本当にこれで十分なのか！？
english: Is that so? /Is this really enough！?
